channel.title: Spec bar help
channel.description:
i'm having a problem with my spec bar, i have the spec bar on dds, magebow, and whip and they work 2, but for the rest of my weapons they don't even have a spec bar so i can't even click on it 2 spec attack a monster.
what would i have 2 do 2 make the spec bar show and i could use the spec?

item.title: Spec bar help

item.description:
